errors.not-recognized:
Oops! Due to Apple's frequency limitations, we can't complete this action right now. 
üëâPlease refresh the page and try again.
errors.custom-provider: JoyID does not support registration on iOS beta or with password managers (such as 1Password, Bitwarden, Enpass, Nordpass, etc.). Please use a stable iOS version or disable your password manager
errors.rsa-key: Your device does not support the P256 signature algorithm, which may be due to an outdated device or BIOS setting issue.

new-device.description: You can quickly and securely sign in next time with biometrics on this device.
new-device.title: Add new device
new-device.heading: 👉 Two-step authentication
new-device.description-primary:
Is required for the first sign-in 
on a new device.
new-device.description-secondary: Don't worry, next time you can sign in directly.

step_descriptions.1:
This key is stored in the device's chip. 
No one can export it and no one can use it without your biometrics
step_descriptions.2: Authorize the new key with a previously registered device that can sign in JoyID
step_descriptions.3:
This device is registered now! 
Sign in to use JoyID in this device

new-device.description-waiting_the_new_device:
This may take 1-2 mins. 
Do not close and refresh the page

session-key-new.title: Sign in temporarily in this Environment
session-key-new.alert: Biometrics sign-in are not supported in current browser (whyü§îÔ∏è). You can continue to sign in temporarily without requiring biometrics.
session-key-new.desc: Temporary sign-in would create a temporary private key in this browser, which enables you to use JoyID under üëâbrowser-level security for a limited time.
session-key-new.warning: Please start on a personal device.

dialog.title: Browser-level Security
dialog.desc-1: The key used in temporary sign-in is securely stored in browser database. No one can export it once created, even JoyID.
dialog.desc-2: But people will be able to sign any message from this device‚Äôs browser without requiring biometrics during the validity period.

session-key-local.title: Temporary sign-in
session-key-local.desc:
Temporary sign-in key are stored securely in the
browser database and no one can export
it even JoyID.

dialog.title: Validity Period Security
dialog.desc-1: We currently do not support setting the validity period.
dialog.desc-2: The current default validity period is 7 days which means it will automatically expire after 7 days.
dialog.desc-3: After expiration, you can create a new temporary sign-in in this browser.

step-1.title: Temporary key generated
step-1.desc: You will be able to sign any message from this device‚Äôs browser within the validity period

step-2.title: Previous Device Authorization
step-2.desc: Authorize the new key with a previously registered device that can sign in JoyID
step-2.warn:
This may take 1-5 mins.
Do not close or refresh the page

step-3.title: Sign in directly
step-3.desc:
This device is registered now!
Sign in to use JoyID in this device

session-key-remote.title: Authenticate new environment
session-key-remote.desc: Do not scan unknown QR codes for authorization, otherwise you may lose your JoyID
session-key-remote.manage-account: Manage my account for any further actions
session-key-remote.permission-err: You don't have permission to authorize with this JoyID
session-key-remote.only-webauthn-key: Please authorize with a permanently sign-in device that can sign in JoyID with biometrics.

dialog.title: Please authorize with a permanently sign-in device that can sign in JoyID with biometrics.

remote-auth-key.desc:
Please check if the QR code fingerprint matches.
Phishing QR code may lead to loss of your account

browser-level-dialog.title: Browser-level Security
browser-level-dialog.desc-1: The key used in temporary sign-in is securely stored in browser database. No one can export it once created, even JoyID.
browser-level-dialog.desc-2: But people will be able to sign any message from this device‚Äôs browser without requiring biometrics during the validity period.

hardware-level-dialog.title: Hardware-level Security
hardware-level-dialog.desc-1: The key is securely stored in the device's chip.
hardware-level-dialog.desc-2: The key cannot be exported or used without your biometrics. This is the best-in-class security level.

not-supported.title: Proceed with recommend device
not-supported.desc:
This browser cannot interact with JoyID.
Please try with a recommended device.
not-supported.feedback: If these steps don't work, kindly provide feedback üëâ here.

create.title: Account creation not supported in current environment.
create.password-manager: Please disable password manager such as 1Password, Bitwarden, Enpass, etc. and then try again.
create.windows-hello: Your current device doesn't support specific algorithm. If upgraded from Windows 10 or Windows 11 21H2, please reset Windows Hello and try again.
create.ios-beta: Please use a stable version of iOS 16 or higher, or use another device.

login.title: You canceled or timed out
login.solution: If you don't find the desired Passkey in the list:

apple.list-1: Make sure you're using the right iCloud account.
apple.list-2: Ensure the Key can be synced to this environment. Check under 'Security/Devices'.
apple.list-3: If your account was created in non-Safari browser on macOS 13 or earlier, the account cannot be synced.

non-apple.list-1: Make sure you're using the right Google account.
non-apple.list-2: Ensure the Key can be synced to this environment. Check under 'Security/Devices'.

wallet-not-found.title: Wallet not found
wallet-not-found.solution: This key might have been revoked. Please select another key to proceed.

android.os: Your Android version must be 7.0 or higher, or use another device.
android.browser: Please use a supported browser like Chrome, Edge, or Brave.

unsupported.list-0: Sign up with Chrome ‚Äî please note, Kiwi and Mises won't work as they don't support passkey
unsupported.list-1: Ensure your phone can use Google services.
unsupported.list-3: Ensure no second space is activated on MIUI.

ios.os: Please upgrade to iOS version 16 or higher, or use another device.
ios.browser: Please use a supported browser like Safari, Chrome, Edge, or Brave.
ios.unsupported: Please restart your browser and try again, or use another device.

macos.os: Please upgrade your macOS to Catalina or a higher version with TouchID, or use another device.
macos.browser: Please use a supported browser like Safari, Chrome, Edge, or Brave.
macos.unsupported: Ensure your device can use TouchID, otherwise please use another device.

windows.os: Please upgrade to Windows 11 22H2 or a later version, or use another device.
windows.browser: Please use a supported browser like Safari, Chrome, Edge, or Brave.
windows.unsupported: Please ensure <hello>Windows Hello</hello> is properly set up.

other-os.os: This operating systemis currently not supported. Please use another device.
